nodes.documentation: @dev this event is emitted when a listing is created
nodes.name: ListingCreated

nodes.documentation: @dev this event is for when listing is modified ,item sold or withdrawn
nodes.name: ListingChanged

nodes.documentation: @dev this event is for when item purchase is requested by buyer
nodes.name: PurchaseRequested

nodes.documentation:
@dev this event is for when seller confirms item purchase by buyer
 @dev the hash of the item string is added the block chain from where the buyer can retrieve and decrypt
nodes.name: encryptedKey

nodes.documentation: event emitted when the a item is bought and both the seller and buyer gets the money/item

nodes.documentation:
Confirmation from buyer on receiving item
 the buyer confirms to get the refund of the money owed.(price)
 the seller gets his amount + price (3 * price)
 @dev the listing id is the item being exchanged
nodes.name: confirmDelivery

nodes.documentation: Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether.
nodes.name: abort

confirmDelivery(uint256).details: the listing id is the item being exchanged

fetchactivelistings().details: returns a list of active listings

requestBuy(uint256).details: listing id is the id of the item buyer is interested in

sellItem(uint256,string).details: listing id is the id of the item being sold_H is the hashed key for the item string (Hashed using the public key of the buyer off-chain)

abort(uint256).notice: Abort the purchase and reclaim the ether.

confirmDelivery(uint256).notice: Confirmation from buyer on receiving item the buyer confirms to get the refund of the money owed.(price) the seller gets his amount + price (3 * price)

requestBuy(uint256).notice: Request from buyer to seller for item's purchase the contract emits a event to let the seller know that an buyer has been found

sellItem(uint256,string).notice: Sale of item from seller's side Transaction from the seller
